question: What is the maximum loan amount permitted under the Personal Loan in India?
option1: Depends upon the income of the borrower
option2: Maximum amount is such that EMI is not more than 40-50% of the monthly income.
explanation: Maximum amount for personal loan usually depends on your income and varies based on whether one is salaried or self-employed. Usually, the banks restrict the loan amount such that your EMI isn't more than 40-50% of your monthly income.
